form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC Diarrhoea> CHPS + mother & child is able to stay for > 4 hours at facility

field.name: In Facility Care for Diarrhoea with Some Dehydration | Take Action: First 4-hour period
Determine amount of ORS to give during the first 4 hour period
If the child wants more ORS than recommended, give more
Show the mother/caregiver how to give ORS:
Give frequent small sips from a clean cup
If the child vomits, wait 10 minutes. Then continue, but more slowly.
